name: Orb of Inhibition
effect:
:ongoing: During this Combat, all [:spellpower:](../spells/index.md) and [Specialty](../heroes/index.md) cards deal 0 :damage:. Remove this card instead of discarding it.

— OR —

:ongoing: During this Combat round, [units](../units/index.md) cannot use their special abilities.
flavor_text: You help a Peasant catch a mare. As gratitude, he hands you a sphere. When you grasp it, you feel the magical energy drain from your limbs...
